description.value: You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Elemental Betrayal] hex. Your familiar learns your choice of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Burning Hands], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Air Bubble], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Hydraulic Push], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Pummeling Rubble].
